thread.title: Investment Announced For Geopolitical Risk Analytics Specialist
thread.title_full: Investment Announced For Geopolitical Risk Analytics Specialist

title: Investment Announced For Geopolitical Risk Analytics Specialist
text:
02 Investment Announced For Geopolitical Risk Analytics Specialist 
Homeland Security Today: Geopolitical risk analytics start-up Cytora, which holds a proprietary real time dataset of risk event data stretching across multiple categories such as social unrest, crime, political violence, strikes, fires and explosions, has raised a second round of funding from investors including Cambridge Enterprise, Parkwalk Advisors and angel investors.Cambridge Enterprise is the venture arm of Cambridge University, UK, and this latest investment will enable Cytora to drive customer growth in the core markets of supply chain risk management and financial services, and to accelerate development of its event detection technology. Terms of the investment were not disclosed, and the round was oversubscribed.
